com.license4j

Class License

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.license4j.License

  • public class License
extends java.lang.Object
    License class, obtained after license validation and activation methods.

      Method stops license and server check timer tasks which starts after license validation of Floating License Text and Online License Key Floating Over Internet.

      • getManualActivationRequestString

        public java.lang.String getManualActivationRequestString()
        Return activation request string.
        Returns:
        activation request string to submit on Online.LicenseJ site or Auto License Generation and Activation Server. Returns null if license activation status is ACTIVATION_NOT_REQUIRED.

      • getUseCountCurrent

        public int getUseCountCurrent()
        If license is an Online License Key Floating Over Internet, and maximum allowed use count is defined, this method returns current use count otherwise returns 0.
        Returns:
        current use count

      • getUseCountAllowed

        public int getUseCountAllowed()
        If license is a Online License Key Floating Over Internet, and maximum allowed use count is defined, this method returns defined maximum allowed use count otherwise returns 0.
        Returns:
        maximum allowed use count

      • getUseTimeCurrent

        public long getUseTimeCurrent()
        If license is a Online License Key Floating Over Internet, and maximum allowed use time limit is defined, this method returns current use time in seconds otherwise returns 0.
        Returns:
        current use time in seconds

      • getUseTimeLimitAllowed

        public long getUseTimeLimitAllowed()
        If license is a Online License Key Floating Over Internet, and maximum allowed use time limit is defined, this method returns defined maximum allowed use time in seconds otherwise returns 0.
        Returns:
        maximum allowed use time limit in seconds

      • getUsedModificationKeys

        public java.lang.String getUsedModificationKeys()
        If license is activated and activation return type is license text, and if it is modified before with one or more than one modification key, this method returns key separated with a space. If license is not modified before returns null.
        Returns:
        list of keys used to modify license

      • stopFloatingLicenseCheckTimers

        public void stopFloatingLicenseCheckTimers()
        Method stops license and server check timer tasks which starts after license validation of Floating License Text and Online License Key Floating Over Internet. If you need to revalidate an obtained license (e.g. due to an invalid handler call) call this method to stop previous license and server check timer tasks. Otherwise unnecessary timer tasks left behind.

      • releaseFloatingLicense

        public void releaseFloatingLicense()
        Method first stops license and server check timer tasks which starts after license validation of Floating License Text and Online License Key Floating Over Internet, then releases obtained license and set License ValidationStatus to LICENSE_INVALID and set license text to null.

      • getFloatingLicenseServerVersion

        public int getFloatingLicenseServerVersion()
        Method to get floating license server version. Returns version number if server version is 4.4.0 and above, otherwise returns 0.
        Returns:
        floating license server version

      • checkForNewMessage

        public java.lang.String[] checkForNewMessage()
        Method to check for a messages saved for the license or product on Online.License4J. Returns unread messages as string array and mark them as read on server (depending on display count defined for the message). If there is no unread message, method returns an empty string array. Read and unread information is saved based on ethernet address.
        Returns:
        the unread messages in a string array

      • checkForNewMessage

        public java.lang.String[] checkForNewMessage(java.lang.String licenseServer)
        Method to check for new messages saved for the license or product on Auto License Generation and Activation Server. Returns unread message as a string array and mark them as read on server (depending on display count defined for the message). If there is no unread message, method returns an empty string array. Read and unread information is saved based on ethernet address.
        Parameters:
        licenseServer -
        Returns:
        the unread messages in a string array

      • checkForUpdate

        public java.lang.String checkForUpdate(java.lang.String productEdition,
                              java.lang.String productVersion)
        Method to check for software update on Auto License Generation and Activation Server. Returns new version as a String if found on server. Returns null if there is no update version.
        Parameters:
        productEdition -
        productVersion -
        Returns:
        a double number

      • checkForUpdate

        public java.lang.String checkForUpdate(java.lang.String productEdition,
                              java.lang.String productVersion,
                              java.lang.String licenseServer)
        Method to check for software update on Auto License Generation and Activation Server. Returns new version as a String if found on server. Returns null if there is no update version.
        Parameters:
        productEdition -
        productVersion -
        licenseServer -
        Returns:
        a double number

      • checkForUpdateMessage

        public java.lang.String checkForUpdateMessage(java.lang.String productEdition,
                                     java.lang.String newVersion)
        Method to check for software update message on Online.License4J for the given new version. Return the update notification message or null if message is not found.
        Parameters:
        productEdition -
        newVersion -
        Returns:
        the update message

      • checkForUpdateMessage

        public java.lang.String checkForUpdateMessage(java.lang.String productEdition,
                                     java.lang.String newVersion,
                                     java.lang.String licenseServer)
        Method to check for software update message on Auto License Generation and Activation Server for the given new version. Return the update notification message or null if message is not found.
        Parameters:
        productEdition -
        newVersion -
        licenseServer -
        Returns:
        the update message
